oai_dc:dc.dc:title: An elementary proof of Cohen-Gabber theorem in the equal characteristic $p>0$ case
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kurano, Kazuhiko
Shimomoto, Kazuma
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Commutative Algebra
Mathematics - Algebraic Geometry
Mathematics - Number Theory
12F10, 13B40, 13J10
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The aim of this article is to give a new proof of Cohen-Gabber theorem in the equal characteristic $p>0$ case.
Comment: 13 pages, to appear in Tohoku Math. J
